name: Emerging interfaces for building web3 applications
description:
New programable interfaces are emerging from the block space created by web3 — being either on-chain, off-chain and cross-chain or a combination of the three. 

By breaking down what these interfaces are, this workshop will look into examples of these interfaces, with a focus on cross-chain programmability and the available technologies to choose from.

speakers.name: Sacha
speakers.bio: Sacha is a developer advocate at Parity Technologies, on a mission to bring forward Polkadot’s technologies to builders of web3. When he’s not working on workshops, documentation or contributing to web3 projects, you may find him walking around somewhere on earth or playing guitar.
